Package civitas.celestis.graphics.shape

Class PolygonX

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Polygon
civitas.celestis.graphics.shape.PolygonX
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape, Serializable
public class PolygonX extends Polygon
An improved Polygon class which supports the use of objects.
See Also:
